title: How has bar culture changed in your country?

korean: 한국의 바 문화가 최근 몇 년 사이 많이 변했어.
예전엔 주로 호프집이나 소주방이 많았는데, 요즘은 다양해졌어.
칵테일 바, 와인 바, 크래프트 비어 바 등 종류가 다양해.
젊은 층을 중심으로 음주 문화도 바뀌고 있어.
과음보다는 적당히 분위기 즐기면서 마시는 쪽으로.
혼자서도 편하게 갈 수 있는 바들이 생겼어.
바 인테리어도 정말 예뻐져서 인스타그램 명소가 많아.
루프탑 바나 뷰가 좋은 바들이 인기 있어.
건전한 음주 문화가 자리 잡는 것 같아서 긍정적이야.
english: Bar culture in Korea has changed a lot in recent years.
Before, there were mainly beer halls or soju rooms, but these days it's diversified.
There are various types like cocktail bars, wine bars, craft beer bars, etc.
Drinking culture is also changing, centered on the younger generation.
Rather than heavy drinking, toward drinking moderately while enjoying the atmosphere.
Drinking alone has also increased a lot.
Bars where you can comfortably go alone have appeared.
Bar interiors have also become really pretty, so there are many Instagram spots.
Rooftop bars or bars with good views are popular.
The price range has also diversified, so the range of choices has widened.
It's positive that a healthy drinking culture seems to be taking root.
I hope it continues to develop in the future.
